name: I can't believe I've been turned into a small puppet and now I have to defeat the demon lord to save the village
name_original: I can't believe I've been turned into a small puppet and now I have to defeat the demon lord to save the village
description:
Help Smolbjorn and Tolbjorn defeat an ancient evil threatening their precious village. Use their chains as a weapon to defeat the invaders and destroy the ancient evil.

Controls:

A and D to move Smolbjorn left and right

J and L to move Tolbjorn left and right

If you die, press R to restart!
